body:
It looks like the parameters in the doc of [aws coreos getting-started-guides](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/blob/master/docs/getting-started-guides/aws-coreos.md) doesn't works properly.

I'm using the latest aws cli released [v1.7.27](https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/releases/tag/1.7.27), and the create stack command in the doc keep popping error of "missing parameters" to me.

```
$ aws --version
aws-cli/1.7.27 Python/2.7.6 Darwin/14.3.0

$ aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name kubernetes --region ap-southeast-1 \
  --template-body file://$(pwd)/cloudformation-template.json \
  --parameters "ParameterKey=KeyPair,ParameterValue=<Key_id>" \
  --parameters "ParameterKey=ClusterSize,ParameterValue=3" \
  --parameters "ParameterKey=VpcId,ParameterValue=vpc-<id>" \
  --parameters "ParameterKey=SubnetId,ParameterValue=subnet-<id>" \
  --parameters "ParameterKey=SubnetAZ,ParameterValue=ap-southeast-1b"

A client error (ValidationError) occurred when calling the CreateStack operation: Parameters: [KeyPair, SubnetId, VpcId] must have values
```

I had a glance into the `aws cloudformation create-stack help` content, it tells parameters need to **separated by space**:

```
--parameters (list)
  A list of Parameter structures that specify input parameters for the stack.

  Shorthand Syntax:
     Key value pairs, with multiple values separated by a space.
     --parameters ParameterKey=string,ParameterValue=string,UsePreviousValue=boolean ParameterKey=string,ParameterValue=string,UsePreviousValue=boolean
```

Then I tried below commands, and now it works!

```
$ aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name kubernetes --region ap-southeast-1 \
  --template-body file://$(pwd)/cloudformation-template.json \
  --parameters ParameterKey=KeyPair,ParameterValue=<Key_id> \
  ParameterKey=ClusterSize,ParameterValue=3 \
  ParameterKey=VpcId,ParameterValue=vpc-<id> \
  ParameterKey=SubnetId,ParameterValue=subnet-<id> \
  ParameterKey=SubnetAZ,ParameterValue=ap-southeast-1b

{
    "StackId": "arn:aws:cloudformation:ap-southeast-1:<id>:stack/kubernetes/<id>-<id>-<id>-<id>-<id>"
}
```

Looks like the `--parameters` option should only be use once, the command in doc is incorrect.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to documentation.
labels.name: kind/documentation

title: Incorrect aws cli parameters format in doc
